src.config.rs: Module for handling API configuration (e.g., database connection)

controllers.company_controller.rs: Module for implementing company-related business logic
controllers.customer_controller.rs: Module for implementing customer-related business logic
controllers.product_controller.rs: Module for implementing product-related business logic
controllers.purchase_controller.rs: Module for implementing purchase-related business logic

db.mysql.rs: Module for handling MySQL database connection and queries

src.errors.rs: Module for defining custom error types

handlers.company.rs: Module for handling company-related API endpoints
handlers.customer.rs: Module for handling customer-related API endpoints
handlers.helpers.rs: Module for common helper functions used across handlers
handlers.product.rs: Module for handling product-related API endpoints
handlers.purchase.rs: Module for handling purchase-related API endpoints

src.main.rs: Main entry point of the API service

middlewares.auth.rs: Module for implementing authentication and authorization middleware

src.models.rs: Module for defining data models and database schema

repositories.company_repository.rs: Module for database operations related to companies
repositories.customer_repository.rs: Module for database operations related to customers
repositories.product_repository.rs: Module for database operations related to products
repositories.purchase_repository.rs: Module for database operations related to purchases

services.company_service.rs: Module for interacting with the company data in the database
services.customer_service.rs: Module for interacting with the customer data in the database
services.product_service.rs: Module for interacting with the product data in the database
services.purchase_service.rs: Module for interacting with the purchase data in the database

src.utils.rs: Module for utility functions used across the project
